transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello
Customer: Hanji.
Executive: Abella polymers se?
Customer: Hanji.
Executive: Rahul India Mart ke bihaf pe senior manager.
Customer: Ji ji ji ji ji boliye.
Executive: Sir aapka na subah mein discussion hua hoga India Mart ke employee Mr. Rahul ke sath mein sir.
Customer: Ji ji ji ji ji.
Executive: Bad aapne ek feedback diya tha aapke pass whatsapp pe aur aapne waha pe not satisfied mark kiya tha. To usi ke liye connect kiya hu ki sir matlab ki kya issues aa rahe the.
Customer: Sir aisa dekhiye main mere ghar mein mujhe char mahine ho gaye honge teen mahine honge aap yaha se jude hue mujhe koi business nahi mila sir.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Ab aap bataye main kahi invest karunga aur mujhe kuch na mile.
Customer: Dekhiye maine apne product profile kuch diya hua hai mere paas inquiry aati hai pidilite ki wo bhi 10 kilo bhej do I am a manufacturer not a dealer ya not a sub dealer.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Ab main manufacturer hu 10-10 bar aur fir main jis company ka mal nahi banata main apni company ka mal banata hu to main apni company ka mal to sale kar sakta hu dusri company ka mal sale kahan se karunga bataye aap mere se relevant ek bhi aaj tak nahi aayi mere paas koi bhi.
Executive: Apna to jo product manufacturing hai plus aapka jo main product hai wo wood adhesive PV adhesive synthetic adhesive emulsion adhesive sir tha na industrial mein jo bhi hota hai correct sir.
Customer: Yes. Ji ji ji ji ji.
Executive: Theek hai ab aapke pass jo leads aari pehle se to retail ka jyadatar aa raha correct sir.
Customer: Ji ji ji.
Executive: Apna minimum order value kitna rehta hai agar koi bhi deal agar bolta hai.
Customer: Dekhiye aisa hai na hamara minimum value 200 kg to kam se kam hai minimum.
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: Ji aur main to kahunga starting mein koi 100 kg ka bhi aata hai to hum use bhi entertain karenge.
Executive: Chalo wo actual mein wo to sahi.
Executive: Samajhiye sir main aapko ek cheez guide karta hu dekhiye ek cheez mujhe batayenge aap Mithil sahab ki jo kharidne wala hoga na wo kaun hoga sir ki like samne wala bhi koi manufacturer hoga koi product line ka ya dealer hoga I am telling you he is working in corrugation then wo manufacturer bhi ho sakta hai he is manufacturing matlab column like speaker.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: To he is also manufacturer also. Hmm. Aur wood working industries he is making a furniture industries.
Executive: Okay. Wood industries also.
Customer: Aur may be a dealer may be a dealer furniture dealer.
Executive: Furniture dealer also chemical hardner ya bonding agents aur wood adhesive ka wholesale dealer bhi ho sakta hai na.
Customer: Definitely definitely wo to main hamare customer hi plywood ka distributor aur hardware ka dealer yahi hote hain hamare main network hamara yahi hai.
Executive: Mujhe ek lead show kar rahi hai emulsion adhesive ka samne wala ek wholesaler trader hai sir jiska bhi product line aapki product line se same hai okay ab ye jo buyer hai na wo already market mein kisi na kisi manufacturer se product kharid raha hai but usne India Mart pe requirement dali hai to aapko main wo batata hu ki aisi lead aapko GST verified lead ya fir jo aap market mein dhundh rahe na jaise buyer wo aapko kaise milega to aap ek bar jara India Mart ko open karenge loudspeaker karke sir.
Customer: Sir main is time bike par hu ya to hum sham ko 6 baje baith le ya sham ko 6 baje bhi nahi aise karte aadha ghante mein baithte hain hum.
Executive: Aadhe ghante mein to main aapko 4:30 se 4:45 ke beech mein.
Customer: Hanji hanji hanji hanji hanji.
Executive: Hai na main connect karta hu sir main details explain karta hu uske hisab se aap use kariye aapko relevant buyer milna shuru kar jayega.
Customer: Okay okay thank you thank you.
Executive: Thank you sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not getting business from IndiaMART.

- Getting irrelevant leads.

- Minimum order quantity is 200 kg.



Resolution:

- Executive explained how to get relevant leads.

- Executive will connect in half an hour.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will connect in half an hour.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, product profile, minimum order
